item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, April 17, 2025 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Astronomers have found signs of alien life on a planet beyond our Solar System (163 points | 96 comments)
2. Advanced Shell Scripting with Bash (2006) [pdf] (15 points | 3 comments)
3. Zoom outage caused by accidental 'shutting down' of the zoom.us domain (385 points | 190 comments)
4. Passing planes and other whoosh sounds (86 points | 14 comments)
5. BitNet b1.58 2B4T Technical Report (31 points | 4 comments)
6. Manga Guide To Databases (2004) [pdf] (49 points | 5 comments)
7. The Atari 1200XL Fiasco – By Paul Lefebvre (7 points | 2 comments)
8. Why Japan's "Weakest Samurai Warlord" Is Still Admired to This Day (3 points | discuss)
9. How refrigeration changed our food (44 points | 39 comments)
10. Darwin's children drew all over the “On the Origin of Species” manuscript (2014) (423 points | 114 comments)
11. Concurrency in Haskell: Fast, Simple, Correct (115 points | 51 comments)
12. Scientists pioneer chemical process to repurpose rubber waste (20 points | 2 comments)
13. Formance (YC S21) Is Hiring Engineers to Build OSS Financial Infrastructure ( | hide)
14. OpenAI Codex CLI: Lightweight coding agent that runs in your terminal (437 points | 239 comments)
15. Show HN: Plandex v2 – open source AI coding agent for large projects and tasks (155 points | 30 comments)
16. Making Software (18 points | 2 comments)
17. TLS certificate lifetimes will officially reduce to 47 days (471 points | 578 comments)
18. Clowning Around: On the Principles of Clowning (14 points | 1 comment)
19. The Halting Problem is a terrible example of NP-Harder (32 points | 39 comments)
20. Differentiable Programming from Scratch (20 points | 3 comments)
21. How a Forgotten Battle Created a More Peaceful World (124 points | 47 comments)
22. Damn Vulnerable MCP Server (195 points | 55 comments)
23. 12-factor Agents: Patterns of reliable LLM applications (353 points | 54 comments)
24. Jellyfin as a Spotify alternative (331 points | 314 comments)
25. Man who built ISP instead of paying Comcast expands to hundreds of homes (2022) (466 points | 190 comments)
26. Kermit: A typeface for kids (325 points | 154 comments)
27. CVE Foundation (382 points | 71 comments)
28. Reproducing Hacker News writing style fingerprinting (298 points | 141 comments)
29. In Two Moves, AlphaGo and Lee Sedol Redefined the Future (2016) (26 points | 14 comments)
30. Query Engines: Push vs. Pull (2021) (86 points | 4 comments)
